orderedMerchandiseTop10: SELECT koName AS name,COUNT(*)AS y FROM proxy.orderedMerchandise inner join proxy.merchandise on orderedMerchandise.merchandiseId=merchandise.id WHERE status not in('UNPAID','CANCELED')GROUP BY koName ORDER BY y DESC LIMIT 10;
refundedMerchandiseTop10: SELECT koName AS name,COUNT(*)AS y FROM proxy.orderedMerchandise inner join proxy.merchandise on orderedMerchandise.merchandiseId=merchandise.id WHERE status='CANCELED'GROUP BY koName ORDER BY y DESC LIMIT 10;
